trans-unit.source: Specifies the types of framework-level property behavior that pertain to a particular dependency property in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] property system.
trans-unit.target: 指定屬於特定相依性屬性在架構層級屬性行為的型別[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]屬性系統。

trans-unit.source: Use this enumeration when you construct a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata> instance where you want to specify one or more the framework-level metadata option settings.
trans-unit.target: 當您建構時使用這個列舉型別<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata>您要指定一個或多個架構層級中繼資料 選項設定的執行個體。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata>

trans-unit.source: You no longer use this enumeration after the constructor call.
trans-unit.target: 您無法再使用這個列舉型別建構函式呼叫之後。

trans-unit.source: Instead, query the particular metadata option that was set during registration by checking the `true` or `false` value of a specific property of an existing <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata>.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，查詢特定的中繼資料選項已設定在註冊期間藉由檢查`true`或`false`現有<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata>.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata>特定屬性的值

trans-unit.source: These property names match the FrameworkPropertyMetadataOptions enumeration values except for NotDataBindable, which is <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.IsNotDataBindable%2A> on the finished <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata>.
trans-unit.target: 這些屬性的名稱符合 FrameworkPropertyMetadataOptions 列舉值，除了 NotDataBindable，即<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.IsNotDataBindable%2A>完成<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata>。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.IsNotDataBindable%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Journal option only specifies the intention to be journaled.
trans-unit.target: 筆記本選項只會指定要日誌型的意圖。

trans-unit.source: The actual journaling may or may not be addressed by journaling services such as those that are present in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] viewer application.
trans-unit.target: 實際的日誌可能或可能不會解決日誌記錄服務，例如在於[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]檢視器應用程式。

trans-unit.source: In particular, journaling has some known limitations if the element tree was constructed through code rather than [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 如果項目樹狀結構透過程式碼建構日誌特別的是，有一些已知的限制而不是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: For details, see [Navigation Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[巡覽概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Although property value inheritance might appear to work for nonattached dependency properties, the inheritance behavior for a nonattached property through certain element boundaries in the runtime tree is undefined.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 雖然繼承屬性值可能會顯示適用於非附加相依性屬性，請透過在執行階段樹狀結構中特定項目界限的附加屬性的繼承行為是未定義。

trans-unit.source: Always use <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.RegisterAttached%2A> to register properties where you specify <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.Inherits%2A> in the metadata.
trans-unit.target: 一律使用<xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.RegisterAttached%2A>註冊屬性，指定<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.Inherits%2A>中繼資料中。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.Inherits%2A> </xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.RegisterAttached%2A>

trans-unit.source: The arrange pass of layout composition is affected by value changes to this dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 配置撰寫的排列傳遞會受到這個相依性屬性的值變更。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: The measure pass of layout compositions is affected by value changes to this dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 配置撰寫的測量傳遞會受到這個相依性屬性的值變更。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: The arrange pass on the parent element is affected by value changes to this dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 父項目的排列傳遞會受到這個相依性屬性的值變更。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: The measure pass on the parent element is affected by value changes to this dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 父項目的測量行程會受到這個相依性屬性的值變更。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Some aspect of rendering or layout composition (other than measure or arrange) is affected by value changes to this dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 轉譯或配置撰寫的某些方面 (以外測量或排列) 的這個相依性屬性的值變更會影響。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingMode"></xref> for data bindings on this dependency property defaults to <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingMode.TwoWay>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingMode"> </xref>用於這個相依性屬性的資料繫結至<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingMode.TwoWay>。</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingMode.TwoWay>的預設值

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: The values of this dependency property are inherited by child elements.
trans-unit.target: 子項目會繼承這個相依性屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: The values of this dependency property should be saved or restored by journaling processes, or when navigating by [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri#initcap#plural](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-urisharpinitcapsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 這個相依性屬性的值應該儲存或還原由日誌處理程序，或在巡覽時由[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri#initcap#plural](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-urisharpinitcapsharpplural-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: No options are specified; the dependency property uses the default behavior of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] property system.
trans-unit.target: 未不指定任何選項。相依性屬性使用的預設行為[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]屬性系統。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Data binding to this dependency property is not allowed.
trans-unit.target: 不允許資料繫結至這個相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: The values of this dependency property span separated trees for purposes of property value inheritance.
trans-unit.target: 這個相依性屬性的值會散不同的樹狀結構的屬性值繼承的用途。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: The subproperties on the value of this dependency property do not affect any aspect of rendering.
trans-unit.target: 子屬性對這個相依性屬性的值不會影響轉譯的任何層面。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。
